summary: On January 9, 2009, five college students left New York City for a weekend in the country. 48 hours later, all five students have simply vanished without a trace. There were no leads and no evidence - until now.
cast: Laurel Casillo|Morgan Hooper|Torrey Weiss|Ryan Maslyn|Elyssa Mersdorf|Gail Cadden|Leo's Dog|Sarah E. title: Evil Things
